response.headline: Custom hand-carved wooden chopsticks with personalized engraving in Japanese or English
response.summary: Karaki mokkou offers custom wooden chopsticks that can be hand-carved with personalized engravings in Japanese or English. Customers can choose size, ink color and other customization options. The shop owner is described as super kind and the products are affordable.

extracted_text: My personal fav. Hand carve your own set of wooden chopsticks - super cute designs and pretty affordable. Engrave your name in Japanese or English plus choose the size, ink color and more. Shop owner is super kind.
Custom workshops for your trip! Guide in bio
image_details.key_interest: Custom chopstick carving workshop with personalized engraving options
